titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the month of October 2009 as "Country Music Month" and to honor country music for its long history of supporting America's armed forces and its tremendous impact on national patriotism.

Expressing support for designation of the month of October 2009 as "Country Music Month" and to honor country music for its long history of supporting America's armed forces and its tremendous impact on national patriotism.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Healthy Families and Communities.

bill.summary:
Supports the designation of a Country Music Month (October).
Honors country music for its long history of supporting America's armed forces and its tremendous impact on national patriotism.
